title: Most popular Canadian product categories purchased by consumers in Canada 2015
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Food and lowest at Response Wine.
The highest Response Food has 53.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Wine.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Food and lowest at Response Wine.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 5 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response Food and lowest at Response Wine.
The highest Response Food has 53.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Wine.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 87.0 is found at Response Food and the minimum is found at Wine where Response is 34.0.
Response Beer has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 53.0.
Response Food is higher than any other Responses with value 87.0, followed by Beer, and Clothing. Down to Response Wine with the lowest value 34.0.
The Response Food has 1.74 times more Share of respondents than average.
